title: Nicola McLean says Rebekah Vardy forced to take kids out of school over Coleen Rooney drama
text:

Nicola McLean has claimed that Rebekah Vardy has been forced to take her kids out of school over the Coleen Rooney drama.

The glamour model and fellow WAG, 38, said Rebekah "cannot stop crying" after she was accused of selling stories on Coleen.

Wayne Rooney's wife, 33, publicly accused her or someone using her account of taking stories directly from her Instagram stories and secretly passing them on to the pres.

Rebekah, 37, has denied that she did so and claimed someone hacked her account, and Nicola claims she is struggling to cope with all the memes and trolling she's received.

Speaking on The Jeremy Vine show this morning, Nicola explained: "I don't know Coleen but I do know Rebekah and what she's going through is what nobody should have to go through so publicly.

"She's got people saying they hope her baby dies inside her, she's seven months pregnant, she's had to take her daughter out of school.

"I've never actually seen, in the whole time I've been in this industry social media and media backlash for someone."

The Celebrity Big Brother star, who is married to footballer Tom Williams, said Rebekah is taking legal action to clear her name.

But she says she is mostly angry that Coleen accused her so publicly.

Nicola continued: "What she's shocked about, and what I quite agree with, is how publicly Coleen has done it.

"Coleen has been very clever as to say it's 'Rebekah Vardy's account', so that's not saying it's Rebekah it's someone else with access. If she thought that shouldn't she have called Rebekah."

(Image: Twitter)

She also doesn't agree with all the memes that have arrived in their thousands since Coleen's tweet.

Nicola added: "I think we'rwe quick to sit here and say social media, the bullying, it's horrendous, young girls are having such bad anxiety with it.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

"I've just said to you Rebekah, who is seven months pregnant, she cannot stop crying, she's had to take her kids out of school, she's had to come back from a holiday.

"I know everyone's gonna go 'How lucky is she to be on holiday, it's still the fact she's had to interrupt her holiday.

"She's devastated she doesn't see the funny side of this but we're all sitting here and laughing about it."
description: Coleen, 33, sensationally accused Rebekah, 37, of taking fake stories from her Instagram account and selling them
